name: Summer Heat Beach Volleyball
description: The only beach volleyball game available for the PlayStation 2, Summer Heat Beach Volleyball takes you on a journey to the world's hottest summer spots to face off in fast-paced two-on-two arcade action. Select from fourteen beautiful characters, each with player-specific attributes and abilities, and then play in twelve different locations around the world, including Venice Beach Stadium and Silver Sands Beach. Earn special moves, spikes, speed-ups, and unlock characters and hidden features on your way to becoming the best player on the sand. Summer Heat Beach Volleyball serves up a dose of sun, fun, and sand right into your living room.
